item.title: Git and blockchain
item.description: Both git and blockchain share the same DNA; they are all built on top of a data structure called Merkle Tree. A Merkle tree is a tree structure where each node of the tree has an identifier that’s the hash of its contents Git is used by software developers around the world to work distributedly so that collaboration among them becomes manageable.This technology is widely adopted, is indispensable and has a good reputation.
